1100101110110001 0100110011011001 1 -> sum: 0001100010001011, cout: 1
0010110010100000 1001010110000010 1 -> sum: 1100001000100011, cout: 0

1010010001110110 1100110110010010 1 -> sum: 0111001000001001, cout: 1
